sections.content:
Question:
Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/V2L, RZ/G2L and RZ/G2LC?
Answer:
We provide a PMIC (RAA215300) with a design optimized for the RZ/V2L. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/power-power-management/power-management-ics-pmic-and-pmus/raa215300-high-performance-9-channel-pmic-supporting-ddr-memory-built-charger-and-rtc
Please also refer to the example of a winning combination which combines the RAA215300 with the RZ/V2L,  RZ/G2L and RZ/G2LC. 
https://www.renesas.com/application/high-performance-computing/hmi-som-ai-accelerator?utm_campaign=power_pmic_raa215300&utm_source=press_release&utm_medium=press_release&utm_content=hmi_som_module_wc
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L
Is there a PMIC that can be used in combination with the RZ/V2L, RZ/G2L and RZ/G2LC?
